articles.title: WeWork says it is finalizing plans to divest its Russia operations - CNN
articles.description: WeWork said Monday that it is planning to divest its operations in Russia, one week after its CEO said the real estate company's "assets do incredibly well" there and he didn't think it would need to pull out of the country.

articles.author: Sabrina Escobar
articles.title: Philip Morris Stock Is Falling. It Has Too Much Exposure to Russia and Ukraine. - Barron's
articles.description: J.P. Morgan downgrades the stock to Neutral, saying that the tobacco company's exposure to Russia could bring near-term headwinds.

articles.author: Coral Davenport
articles.title: E.P.A. Plans Tighter Tailpipe Rules for Trucks, Vans and Buses - The New York Times
articles.description: For the first time since 2001, the government is setting more stringent limits on pollution from trucks, vans, and buses that harms human health.
